sentences.en: We need to discuss this matter carefully.
sentences.zh: 我们需要仔细讨论这件事。

sentences.en: The teacher helped her solve the matter quickly.
sentences.zh: 老师帮她很快解决了这个问题。

sentences.en: My throat feels sore after singing all day.
sentences.zh: 唱了一整天歌后，我的喉咙感到疼痛。

sentences.en: She has a sore knee from running too much.
sentences.zh: 她因为跑步太多膝盖疼。

sentences.en: I have a stomachache after eating too much ice cream.
sentences.zh: 吃了太多冰淇淋后我肚子疼。

sentences.en: She stayed home from school because of a bad stomachache.
sentences.zh: 她因为严重的肚子疼没去上学。

sentences.en: I hurt my foot while playing soccer yesterday.
sentences.zh: 昨天踢足球时我伤到了脚。

sentences.en: He walked for miles and his feet were very tired.
sentences.zh: 他走了好几英里，脚非常累。

sentences.en: He hurt his neck while playing basketball.
sentences.zh: 他打篮球时伤到了脖子。

sentences.en: The giraffe has a very long neck.
sentences.zh: 长颈鹿有很长的脖子。

sentences.en: I have a stomach ache after eating too much ice cream.
sentences.zh: 吃了太多冰淇淋后我肚子疼。

sentences.en: The doctor listened to her stomach with a stethoscope.
sentences.zh: 医生用听诊器听了听她的肚子。

sentences.en: Drinking warm water can soothe a sore throat.
sentences.zh: 喝温水可以缓解喉咙痛。

sentences.en: He cleared his throat before starting to speak.
sentences.zh: 他开始说话前清了清嗓子。

sentences.en: She has a high fever and needs to see a doctor.
sentences.zh: 她发高烧了，需要去看医生。

sentences.en: Drinking more water can help when you have a fever.
sentences.zh: 发烧时多喝水会有帮助。

sentences.en: It is wrong to lie to your parents.
sentences.zh: 对父母撒谎是不对的。

sentences.en: He told a lie about why he was late.
sentences.zh: 他就自己迟到的原因撒了个谎。

sentences.en: I need to rest after playing basketball for an hour.
sentences.zh: 打了一个小时篮球后，我需要休息。

sentences.en: My mother tells me to rest early tonight.
sentences.zh: 妈妈告诉我今晚要早点休息。

sentences.en: She has a bad cough and needs to rest.
sentences.zh: 她咳嗽得很厉害，需要休息。

sentences.en: Cover your mouth when you cough, please.
sentences.zh: 咳嗽时请捂住你的嘴。

sentences.en: The doctor took an X-ray of my chest to check for problems.
sentences.zh: 医生给我的胸部拍了X光片来检查问题。

sentences.en: You need to stand still when getting an X-ray at the hospital.
sentences.zh: 在医院拍X光时你需要站着不动。

sentences.en: I have a terrible toothache and need to see a dentist.
sentences.zh: 我牙痛得厉害，需要去看牙医。

sentences.en: Eating too much candy may cause toothache.
sentences.zh: 吃太多糖果可能会导致牙痛。

sentences.en: I have a headache and need to rest.
sentences.zh: 我头痛，需要休息。

sentences.en: Drinking enough water might help with your headache.
sentences.zh: 喝足够的水可能有助于缓解你的头痛。

sentences.en: Let's take a break after finishing this exercise.
sentences.zh: 完成这个练习后我们休息一下吧。

sentences.en: He needs a break from studying to relax his mind.
sentences.zh: 他需要从学习中休息一下，放松大脑。

sentences.en: He hurt his knee while playing football.
sentences.zh: 他踢足球时伤到了膝盖。

sentences.en: The sad movie didn't hurt my feelings at all.
sentences.zh: 这部悲伤的电影一点也没伤害到我的感情。

sentences.en: The passenger showed his ticket to the train conductor.
sentences.zh: 那位乘客向列车员出示了他的车票。

sentences.en: A kind passenger helped the old lady carry her heavy bag.
sentences.zh: 一位好心的乘客帮老太太提了沉重的包。

zh: 离开（某处）；不工作；从⋯⋯去掉

sentences.en: He turned off the lights before leaving the room.
sentences.zh: 他离开房间前关了灯。

sentences.en: The store is off today because it's a holiday.
sentences.zh: 今天商店休息，因为是假日。

sentences.en: Scientists are working on a new onto the problem.
sentences.zh: 科学家们正在研究一个新的解决方案来解决这个问题。

sentences.en: She climbed onto the table to reach the book.
sentences.zh: 她爬到桌子上够那本书。

sentences.en: I have trouble solving this math problem.
sentences.zh: 我解这道数学题有困难。

sentences.en: Don't trouble yourself with such small things.
sentences.zh: 不要为这种小事费心。

sentences.en: I hit the ball with a bat in the park.
sentences.zh: 我在公园里用球棒击球。

sentences.en: Be careful not to hit your head on the door.
sentences.zh: 小心别让头撞到门上。

sentences.en: Mary often buys gifts for herself on her birthday.
sentences.zh: 玛丽经常在生日时给自己买礼物。

sentences.en: She taught herself how to play the piano last year.
sentences.zh: 她去年自学了如何弹钢琴。

sentences.en: The nurse put a bandage on his injured arm.
sentences.zh: 护士在他受伤的胳膊上缠了绷带。

sentences.en: You need to change the bandage every day to keep the wound clean.
sentences.zh: 你需要每天更换绷带以保持伤口清洁。

sentences.en: The press reported the news about the school event yesterday.
sentences.zh: 新闻界昨天报道了学校活动的消息。

sentences.en: He works for a local press that publishes daily newspapers.
sentences.zh: 他在一家出版日报的地方报社工作。

sentences.en: He stayed home from school because he was sick.
sentences.zh: 他因为生病了没去上学。

sentences.en: My mother told me to rest if I felt sick.
sentences.zh: 妈妈告诉我如果感觉不舒服就休息。

sentences.en: He fell down and hurt his knee while playing football.
sentences.zh: 他踢足球时摔倒了，伤到了膝盖。

sentences.en: My grandma often massages her knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.zh: 我奶奶经常按摩膝盖来缓解疼痛。

sentences.en: He got a nosebleed after hitting his head on the door.
sentences.zh: 他的头撞到门上后流了鼻血。

sentences.en: If you have a nosebleed, sit up and lean forward slightly.
sentences.zh: 如果你流鼻血了，坐起来并稍微前倾。

sentences.en: Take a deep breath and try to breathe calmly.
sentences.zh: 深呼吸，试着平静地呼吸。

sentences.en: Plants breathe in carbon dioxide and release oxygen.
sentences.zh: 植物吸入二氧化碳并释放氧气。

sentences.en: She got sunburned after staying on the beach all day.
sentences.zh: 在海滩待了一整天后，她晒伤了。

sentences.en: You should wear sunscreen to avoid getting sunburned.
sentences.zh: 你应该涂防晒霜以避免被晒伤。

sentences.en: We should believe in ourselves and never give up.
sentences.zh: 我们应该相信自己，永不放弃。

sentences.en: Let's cook dinner by ourselves today.
sentences.zh: 今天我们自己做晚饭吧。

sentences.en: The climber reached the top of the mountain at sunrise.
sentences.zh: 这位登山者在日出时到达了山顶。

sentences.en: My uncle is a skilled climber who has climbed many high mountains.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔是一位熟练的登山者，他攀登过许多高山。

sentences.en: It's important to know the risk of crossing the road without looking.
sentences.zh: 知道过马路不看路的风险是很重要的。

sentences.en: Swimming alone in deep water has a high risk.
sentences.zh: 独自在深水区游泳有很高的风险。

sentences.en: He was late because of a traffic accident.
sentences.zh: 他因为一场交通事故迟到了。

sentences.en: We should be careful to avoid accidents.
sentences.zh: 我们应该小心以避免意外事故。

sentences.en: We need to think about the situation before making a decision.
sentences.zh: 在做决定之前，我们需要考虑一下情况。

sentences.en: Can you describe the situation in the classroom yesterday?
sentences.zh: 你能描述一下昨天教室里的情况吗？

sentences.en: A kilogram is equal to one thousand grams.
sentences.zh: 一千克等于一千克。

sentences.en: This bag of apples weighs about two kilos.
sentences.zh: 这袋苹果重约两千克。

sentences.en: The big rock is lying on the path.
sentences.zh: 那块大石头躺在小路上。

sentences.en: He tried to climb the rock but failed.
sentences.zh: 他尝试爬那块岩石，但失败了。

sentences.en: He uses a knife to cut the bread.
sentences.zh: 他用一把刀来切面包。

sentences.en: Be careful with that sharp knife.
sentences.zh: 小心那把锋利的刀。

sentences.en: Blood is red and carries oxygen in our bodies.
sentences.zh: 血液是红色的，在我们体内输送氧气。

sentences.en: When you cut your finger, blood may come out.
sentences.zh: 当你割破手指时，可能会流血。

sentences.en: What does this word mean?
sentences.zh: 这个单词是什么意思？

sentences.en: Her smile means she is happy.
sentences.zh: 她的微笑意味着她很高兴。

sentences.en: Understanding the importance of studying hard helps you succeed.
sentences.zh: 理解努力学习的重要性有助于你成功。

sentences.en: Water is of great importance to all living things.
sentences.zh: 水对所有生物都至关重要。

sentences.en: Making a decision can be difficult sometimes.
sentences.zh: 有时做决定会很困难。

sentences.en: We need to discuss before we make our final decision.
sentences.zh: 在做最终决定前我们需要讨论一下。

sentences.en: You need to control your temper when you are angry.
sentences.zh: 当你生气时，你需要控制你的脾气。

sentences.en: The teacher helps students control their own learning.
sentences.zh: 老师帮助学生掌控自己的学习。

sentences.en: She has a brave spirit and never gives up easily.
sentences.zh: 她有着勇敢的精神，从不轻易放弃。

sentences.en: The team showed great spirit in the face of difficulties.
sentences.zh: 这支队伍在困难面前展现出了高昂的士气。

sentences.en: The old tree's death made the garden quiet.
sentences.zh: 那棵老树的死亡让花园变得安静了。

sentences.en: We should face the fear of death bravely.
sentences.zh: 我们应该勇敢面对死亡的恐惧。

sentences.en: The nurse helped the doctor take care of the patient.
sentences.zh: 护士协助医生照顾病人。

sentences.en: My aunt works as a nurse in the city hospital.
sentences.zh: 我的姑姑在市医院当护士。

sentences.en: I can't go to school today because I have a cold.
sentences.zh: 我今天不能去上学，因为我感冒了。

sentences.en: You should drink more water if you have a cold.
sentences.zh: 如果你感冒了，应该多喝些水。

sentences.en: I can't go to school today because I have a stomachache.
sentences.zh: 我今天不能去上学，因为我肚子疼。

sentences.en: If you have a stomachache, you should rest and drink warm water.
sentences.zh: 如果你肚子疼，你应该休息并喝温水。

sentences.en: I want to lie down and rest after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我想躺下休息。

sentences.en: Please lie down on the bed and close your eyes.
sentences.zh: 请躺在床上，闭上眼睛。

sentences.en: The nurse will take your temperature before seeing the doctor.
sentences.zh: 护士会在看医生前给你量体温。

sentences.en: You should take your temperature if you feel hot.
sentences.zh: 如果你觉得热，应该量一下体温。

sentences.en: If you have a fever, you should drink more water and rest.
sentences.zh: 如果你发烧了，你应该多喝水并休息。

sentences.en: My little sister didn't go to school today because she has a fever.
sentences.zh: 我的小妹妹今天没上学，因为她发烧了。

sentences.en: We should take breaks between classes to relax.
sentences.zh: 我们应该在课间休息放松一下。

sentences.en: It's important to take breaks when studying for a long time.
sentences.zh: 长时间学习时休息一下很重要。

sentences.en: You need to get off the bus at the next stop.
sentences.zh: 你需要在下一站下车。

sentences.en: Please get off your bike when crossing the street.
sentences.zh: 过马路时请从自行车上下来。

zh: 使⋯⋯惊讶的是；出乎⋯⋯的意料

sentences.en: To his surprise, the little girl could solve the math problem quickly.
sentences.zh: 令他惊讶的是，这个小女孩能快速解出这道数学题。

sentences.en: To our surprise, it started to rain heavily just after we went out.
sentences.zh: 令我们惊讶的是，我们刚出门就下起了大雨。

sentences.en: Please finish your homework right away.
sentences.zh: 请立刻完成你的作业。

sentences.en: He ran to the classroom right away when the bell rang.
sentences.zh: 铃声一响，他立刻跑向教室。

sentences.en: He tried to get into the team by practicing every day.
sentences.zh: 他通过每天练习努力想加入这个队伍。

sentences.en: Can you help me get into the house? I forgot my key.
sentences.zh: 你能帮我进房子吗？我忘带钥匙了。

sentences.en: He is used to getting up early every morning.
sentences.zh: 他习惯了每天早上早起。

sentences.en: My mother is used to cooking dinner at 6 p.m.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈习惯在下午6点做晚饭。

sentences.en: Sometimes we need to take risks to grow and learn new things.
sentences.zh: 有时我们需要冒险来成长和学习新事物。

sentences.en: He decided to take risks and start his own small business.
sentences.zh: 他决定冒险开创自己的小生意。

sentences.en: We might run out of milk if we don't buy some today.
sentences.zh: 如果今天不买牛奶，我们可能会用完。

sentences.en: The party ended early because they ran out of snacks.
sentences.zh: 派对提前结束了，因为他们的零食吃完了。

sentences.en: The meeting will cut off at 5 PM sharp.
sentences.zh: 会议将在下午5点整结束。

sentences.en: Be careful not to cut off the power when using the machine.
sentences.zh: 使用机器时注意不要切断电源。

sentences.en: Please get out of the room quietly.
sentences.zh: 请安静地离开房间。

sentences.en: They need to get out of the rain quickly.
sentences.zh: 他们需要快点躲开雨。

sentences.en: You should be in control of your own learning.
sentences.zh: 你应该掌控自己的学习。

sentences.en: The driver must be in control of the car at all times.
sentences.zh: 司机必须时刻掌控汽车。

sentences.en: Don't give up, and you will succeed.
sentences.zh: 不要放弃，你就会成功。

sentences.en: He decided to give up smoking for his health.
sentences.zh: 为了健康，他决定戒烟。

sentences.en: Please help me clean up the classroom after class.
sentences.zh: 课后请帮我打扫教室。

sentences.en: We need to clean up our rooms every weekend.
sentences.zh: 我们每个周末都需要打扫自己的房间。

sentences.en: Let's cheer for our team at the game tomorrow!
sentences.zh: 明天比赛时让我们为我们的队加油！

sentences.en: Her smile always cheers me up when I feel sad.
sentences.zh: 当我难过时，她的微笑总是能让我振作起来。

sentences.en: Don't be sad, cheer up and everything will be better.
sentences.zh: 别难过，振作起来，一切都会好起来的。

sentences.en: My friends tried to cheer me up when I failed the exam.
sentences.zh: 当我考试不及格时，我的朋友们努力让我振作起来。

sentences.en: The teacher will give out the test papers soon.
sentences.zh: 老师很快会发试卷。

sentences.en: They decided to give out free masks to people in need.
sentences.zh: 他们决定向有需要的人分发免费口罩。

sentences.en: She wants to be a volunteer at the animal shelter this summer.
sentences.zh: 今年夏天她想成为动物收容所的志愿者。

sentences.en: We need more volunteers to help clean up the park.
sentences.zh: 我们需要更多志愿者来帮忙清理公园。

zh: 想出；提出（主意、计划、回答等）

sentences.en: We need to come up with a plan for the school trip.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为学校旅行想出一个计划。

sentences.en: Can you come up with a good idea for the party game?
sentences.zh: 你能为派对游戏想出一个好主意吗？

sentences.en: We have to put off the picnic because of the rain.
sentences.zh: 因为下雨，我们不得不推迟野餐。

sentences.en: Could you please put off the meeting until next Monday?
sentences.zh: 你能把会议推迟到下周一吗？

sentences.en: Put your signature here to sign the document.
sentences.zh: 在这里签名以签署文件。

sentences.en: I need to sign my name on this birthday card.
sentences.zh: 我需要在这张生日贺卡上签名。

sentences.en: There is a notice about the school trip on the wall.
sentences.zh: 墙上有一则关于学校旅行的通知。

sentences.en: Please read the notice carefully before the meeting.
sentences.zh: 开会前请仔细阅读通知。

sentences.en: The teacher will hand out the test papers in five minutes.
sentences.zh: 老师将在五分钟后分发试卷。

sentences.en: Could you help me hand out these books to the students?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我把这些书分发给学生们吗？

sentences.en: I need to call up my friend to discuss the homework.
sentences.zh: 我需要打电话给我的朋友讨论作业。

sentences.en: She will call up her mother when she arrives home.
sentences.zh: 她到家后会给她妈妈打电话。

sentences.en: I used to play football after school every day.
sentences.zh: 我过去每天放学后都踢足球。

sentences.en: She used to have long hair when she was young.
sentences.zh: 她年轻时曾经留着长发。

sentences.en: She felt lonely when her best friend moved away.
sentences.zh: 当她最好的朋友搬走后，她感到很孤独。

sentences.en: The old man lives alone in a small house, but he never feels lonely.
sentences.zh: 那位老人独自住在一间小房子里，但他从不感到孤独。

sentences.en: We should care for our parents when they are old.
sentences.zh: 当父母年老时，我们应该照顾他们。

sentences.en: It's important to care for animals and plants around us.
sentences.zh: 关心我们周围的动植物是很重要的。

sentences.en: There are several books on the desk.
sentences.zh: 桌子上有几本书。

sentences.en: She has several friends in this school.
sentences.zh: 她在这所学校有几个朋友。

sentences.en: She has a strong desire to learn English well.
sentences.zh: 她有学好英语的强烈愿望。

sentences.en: This bridge is strong enough to hold many cars.
sentences.zh: 这座桥足够坚固，可以承载很多汽车。

sentences.en: I have a strong feeling that today will be a good day.
sentences.zh: 我有种强烈的感觉，今天会是美好的一天。

sentences.en: Her feeling of happiness made everyone around her smile.
sentences.zh: 她快乐的感觉让周围的人都笑了起来。

sentences.en: The teacher asked about our satisfaction with the new classroom.
sentences.zh: 老师询问了我们对新教室的满意度。

sentences.en: Her smile showed her satisfaction with the gift.
sentences.zh: 她的微笑表明了她对这份礼物的满意。

sentences.en: Her eyes were full of joy when she got the gift.
sentences.zh: 当她收到礼物时，眼里充满了喜悦。

sentences.en: Singing brings me great joy every day.
sentences.zh: 唱歌每天都给我带来极大的快乐。

sentences.en: The owner of the small shop is very kind to customers.
sentences.zh: 这家小店的店主对顾客非常友善。

sentences.en: My uncle is the owner of three big factories in the city.
sentences.zh: 我叔叔是城里三家大工厂的所有者。

sentences.en: Let's try out this new game after class.
sentences.zh: 课后我们来试试这个新游戏吧。

sentences.en: You should try out different sports to find your favorite.
sentences.zh: 你应该尝试不同的运动来找到你最喜欢的。

sentences.en: Our journey to the mountain started early in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我们的登山之旅在清晨开始。

sentences.en: Life is like a long journey full of unexpected surprises.
sentences.zh: 人生就像一场充满意外惊喜的漫长旅程。

sentences.en: Please raise your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.zh: 如果你知道答案，请举手。

sentences.en: The sun helps plants raise from the ground.
sentences.zh: 太阳帮助植物从地里生长出来。

sentences.en: We usually go to bed before midnight.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在午夜前睡觉。

sentences.en: The party will start at midnight.
sentences.zh: 派对将在午夜开始。

sentences.en: I like to read alone in my room sometimes.
sentences.zh: 有时我喜欢独自在房间里看书。

sentences.en: She felt a little scared when walking home alone at night.
sentences.zh: 晚上独自走回家时，她感到有点害怕。

sentences.en: My father will repair the broken bike this weekend.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸这个周末会修理那辆坏自行车。

sentences.en: We need to repair the window before it rains.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在下雨前修好窗户。

sentences.en: Can you help me fix my broken bike?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我修理我坏了的自行车吗？

sentences.en: I need to fix the mistake in my homework before submitting it.
sentences.zh: 我需要在交作业前修正里面的错误。

sentences.en: I need to fix up my old bike before riding it.
sentences.zh: 在骑车之前，我需要修理一下我的旧自行车。

sentences.en: She helped her mom fix up the living room for the party.
sentences.zh: 她帮妈妈为聚会整理客厅。

sentences.en: I will give away my old books to the library.
sentences.zh: 我将把我的旧书捐赠给图书馆。

sentences.en: She decided to give away her toys to children in need.
sentences.zh: 她决定把她的玩具送给有需要的孩子们。

sentences.en: She takes after her mother in both looks and personality.
sentences.zh: 她在相貌和性格上都像她的妈妈。

sentences.en: Does your son take after you or his father?
sentences.zh: 你的儿子像你还是像他爸爸？

sentences.en: My bike has a broken wheel and can't move.
sentences.zh: 我的自行车轮子坏了，动不了。

sentences.en: She cried when she saw her broken toy.
sentences.zh: 看到她坏掉的玩具时，她哭了。

sentences.en: The bicycle has a big wheel.
sentences.zh: 这辆自行车有一个大轮子。

sentences.en: He helped his dad fix the broken wheel of the car.
sentences.zh: 他帮爸爸修理汽车坏掉的轮子。

sentences.en: I wrote a letter to my pen pal yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天给我的笔友写了一封信。

sentences.en: She received a letter from her grandmother this morning.
sentences.zh: 她今天早上收到了奶奶的一封信。

sentences.en: I miss my grandparents when I am at school.
sentences.zh: 我在学校的时候想念我的祖父母。

sentences.en: Don't miss the last bus home tonight.
sentences.zh: 今晚不要错过回家的末班车。

sentences.en: We need to set up the tent before it gets dark.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在天黑前搭好帐篷。

sentences.en: She will help set up the party decorations tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 她明天会帮忙布置派对装饰。

sentences.en: The old elevator is disabled and cannot be used.
sentences.zh: 这部旧电梯已停用，无法使用。

sentences.en: He helped the disabled man cross the street safely.
sentences.zh: 他帮助那位残疾人安全过马路。

sentences.en: Small acts of kindness can make a difference in someone's day.
sentences.zh: 小小的善举能改变一个人的一天。

sentences.en: We believe our efforts will make a difference to the environment.
sentences.zh: 我们相信我们的努力会对环境产生影响。

sentences.en: The blind man walks with a stick to find his way.
sentences.zh: 这位盲人拄着拐杖走路来认路。

sentences.en: It's kind to help blind people cross the street.
sentences.zh: 帮助盲人过马路是善良的行为。

sentences.en: The deaf boy communicates with others using sign language.
sentences.zh: 那个失聪的男孩用手语和别人交流。

sentences.en: We should learn some basic sign language to help deaf people.
sentences.zh: 我们应该学习一些基本的手语来帮助失聪人士。

sentences.en: Children often imagine they can fly like birds.
sentences.zh: 孩子们经常想象自己能像鸟一样飞。

sentences.en: Can you imagine living on a quiet island?
sentences.zh: 你能想象住在一个安静的岛上吗？

sentences.en: The difficulty of this math problem is not too high.
sentences.zh: 这道数学题的难度不算太高。

sentences.en: We should face difficulties bravely in life.
sentences.zh: 我们在生活中应该勇敢面对困难。

sentences.en: Open the window, please.
sentences.zh: 请打开窗户。

sentences.en: The door is open, so we can go in.
sentences.zh: 门是开着的，所以我们可以进去。

sentences.en: Please close the door before leaving.
sentences.zh: 离开前请关上门。

sentences.en: The cat ran through the open door quickly.
sentences.zh: 那只猫飞快地穿过敞开的门。

sentences.en: Can you carry this heavy box for me?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我搬这个重箱子吗？

sentences.en: I always carry my phone in my pocket.
sentences.zh: 我总是把手机放在口袋里带着。

sentences.en: I take the train to school every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上乘火车去上学。

sentences.en: The train arrived at the station on time.
sentences.zh: 火车准时到站了。

sentences.en: I am excited to go to the amusement park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我很兴奋明天要去游乐园。

sentences.en: Her excited smile showed she loved the gift.
sentences.zh: 她兴奋的笑容表明她喜欢这份礼物。

sentences.en: We need to do more training to improve our skills.
sentences.zh: 我们需要做更多训练来提高我们的技能。

sentences.en: Her daily training helps her run faster.
sentences.zh: 她的日常训练帮助她跑得更快。

sentences.en: Her kindness made everyone in the class feel warm.
sentences.zh: 她的善良让班上的每个人都感到温暖。

sentences.en: We should always show kindness to others around us.
sentences.zh: 我们应该始终对身边的人表现出善意。

sentences.en: The clever boy solved the math problem quickly.
sentences.zh: 这个聪明的男孩很快解出了这道数学题。

sentences.en: She has a clever way to remember English words.
sentences.zh: 她有一个记英语单词的聪明方法。

sentences.en: I can't understand this math problem.
sentences.zh: 我不能理解这道数学题。

sentences.en: Please explain it again so I can understand.
sentences.zh: 请再解释一遍，这样我就能理解了。

sentences.en: Seasons change from spring to winter every year.
sentences.zh: 季节每年从春天变化到冬天。

sentences.en: You can change your mind if you want to.
sentences.zh: 如果你想的话，你可以改变主意。

sentences.en: My main interest is playing basketball with friends.
sentences.zh: 我的主要爱好是和朋友们打篮球。

sentences.en: She developed an interest in painting at a young age.
sentences.zh: 她在很小的时候就对绘画产生了兴趣。

zh: 先生（用于正式信函中对不知名的男性收信人的称呼时，写为Sir）

sentences.en: Excuse me, sir, can you tell me the way to the library?
sentences.zh: 打扰一下，先生，您能告诉我去图书馆的路吗？

sentences.en: The sir in the black suit is our new teacher.
sentences.zh: 那个穿黑西装的先生是我们的新老师。

zh: 夫人；女士（用于正式信函中对不知名的女性收信人的称呼时，写为Madam）

sentences.en: Excuse me, madam, do you need any help?
sentences.zh: 打扰一下，女士，您需要帮助吗？

sentences.en: The madam smiled and thanked the kind boy.
sentences.zh: 这位女士微笑着感谢了那个善良的男孩。

sentences.en: We should put the rubbish into the bin.
sentences.zh: 我们应该把垃圾放进垃圾桶里。

sentences.en: Don't leave rubbish on the ground, please.
sentences.zh: 请不要把垃圾丢在地上。

sentences.en: Can you help me take out the rubbish after dinner?
sentences.zh: 晚饭后你能帮我把垃圾拿出去吗？

sentences.en: My mom always reminds me to take out the rubbish before going to bed.
sentences.zh: 妈妈总是提醒我睡觉前要把垃圾拿出去。

sentences.en: Can you fold the paper into a boat?
sentences.zh: 你能把纸折成一艘船吗？

sentences.en: She helps her mom fold the clothes every evening.
sentences.zh: 她每天晚上帮妈妈叠衣服。

sentences.en: The students help sweep the classroom every day.
sentences.zh: 学生们每天帮忙打扫教室。

sentences.en: My mom asks me to sweep the floor after dinner.
sentences.zh: 妈妈让我晚饭后扫地。

sentences.en: My classroom is on the second floor.
sentences.zh: 我的教室在二楼。

sentences.en: Please sweep the floor before leaving.
sentences.zh: 离开前请打扫地板。

sentences.en: The room was in a mess after the party.
sentences.zh: 派对结束后，房间里一片狼藉。

sentences.en: Please clean up your desk; it’s such a mess!
sentences.zh: 请整理一下你的书桌，太乱了！

sentences.en: Don't throw stones at the window.
sentences.zh: 不要朝窗户扔石头。

sentences.en: She can throw the ball very far.
sentences.zh: 她能把球扔得很远。

sentences.en: My little sister asks questions all the time.
sentences.zh: 我的妹妹总是问问题。

sentences.en: We should keep our classroom clean all the time.
sentences.zh: 我们应该一直保持教室干净。

sentences.en: Neither of the two books is mine.
sentences.zh: 这两本书都不是我的。

sentences.en: She likes neither apples nor bananas.
sentences.zh: 她既不喜欢苹果也不喜欢香蕉。

sentences.en: He wears a blue shirt to school every day.
sentences.zh: 他每天穿一件蓝色衬衫上学。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new shirt for my birthday.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈为我的生日买了一件新衬衫。

sentences.en: I will call you as soon as I arrive home.
sentences.zh: 我一到家就给你打电话。

sentences.en: As soon as the bell rings, the students run out of the classroom.
sentences.zh: 铃声一响，学生们就跑出了教室。

sentences.en: Can I borrow your pen? I forgot mine at home.
sentences.zh: 我能借你的钢笔吗？我把我的忘在家里了。

sentences.en: She often goes to the library to borrow storybooks.
sentences.zh: 她经常去图书馆借故事书。

sentences.en: Can you lend me your pen?
sentences.zh: 你能把你的钢笔借给我吗？

sentences.en: My friend often lends me books to read.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友经常借书给我看。

sentences.en: He hurt his finger while cutting vegetables.
sentences.zh: 他切菜时伤到了手指。

sentences.en: Can you count from one to ten with your fingers?
sentences.zh: 你能用手指从一数到十吗？

sentences.en: We should never spread hate among people.
sentences.zh: 我们绝不应该在人们之间传播仇恨。

sentences.en: Her words were full of hate and anger.
sentences.zh: 她的话语充满了仇恨和愤怒。

sentences.en: Doing the dishes is my daily chore.
sentences.zh: 洗碗是我的日常家务。

sentences.en: She helps her mom with chores every weekend.
sentences.zh: 她每个周末都帮妈妈做家务。

zh: 与⋯⋯同时；当⋯⋯的时候；而；然而

sentences.en: I was doing homework while my mom was cooking dinner.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈做饭时，我正在做作业。

sentences.en: While he likes math, his sister prefers English.
sentences.zh: 虽然他喜欢数学，但他妹妹更喜欢英语。

sentences.en: I often eat an apple as a snack after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我经常把苹果当零食吃。

sentences.en: My mother bought some snacks for the party.
sentences.zh: 妈妈为聚会买了一些零食。

sentences.en: Too much homework can cause stress for students.
sentences.zh: 太多作业会给学生带来压力。

sentences.en: I try to relax when I feel stress from exams.
sentences.zh: 当我感到考试压力时，我会试着放松。

sentences.en: We should not throw waste paper on the ground.
sentences.zh: 我们不应该把废纸扔在地上。

sentences.en: It's important to separate waste for recycling.
sentences.zh: 将垃圾分类回收很重要。

sentences.en: I study hard in order to get good grades.
sentences.zh: 我努力学习是为了取得好成绩。

sentences.en: We exercise every day in order to stay healthy.
sentences.zh: 我们每天锻炼是为了保持健康。

sentences.en: Could you please provide me with a pen?
sentences.zh: 你能给我一支钢笔吗？

sentences.en: The teacher will provide us with new books tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 老师明天会给我们提供新书。

sentences.en: Anyway, we need to finish our homework before dinner.
sentences.zh: 不管怎样，我们需要在晚饭前完成作业。

sentences.en: She was tired, but she went to school anyway.
sentences.zh: 她很累，但还是去上学了。

sentences.en: Our success depends on hard work.
sentences.zh: 我们的成功取决于努力工作。

sentences.en: Plants depend on sunlight and water to grow.
sentences.zh: 植物依靠阳光和水生长。

sentences.en: Our success will depend on hard work.
sentences.zh: 我们的成功将取决于努力工作。

sentences.en: Plants depend on water and sunlight to grow.
sentences.zh: 植物依靠水和阳光生长。

sentences.en: We need to develop good study habits.
sentences.zh: 我们需要培养良好的学习习惯。

sentences.en: Plants develop from seeds.
sentences.zh: 植物由种子发育而成。

sentences.en: Many countries celebrate their independence on special days.
sentences.zh: 许多国家在特殊的日子庆祝它们的独立。

sentences.en: She values her independence and likes to make decisions by herself.
sentences.zh: 她珍视自己的独立，喜欢自己做决定。

sentences.en: We should treat everyone with fairness.
sentences.zh: 我们应该公平地对待每个人。

sentences.en: The teacher always checks homework with fairness.
sentences.zh: 老师总是公平地检查作业。

sentences.en: I have lived here since 2010.
sentences.zh: 我从2010年起就住在这里了。

sentences.en: She has been happy since she got the gift.
sentences.zh: 自从收到礼物后，她一直很开心。

sentences.en: My neighbor often helps me with my homework.
sentences.zh: 我的邻居经常帮我辅导作业。

sentences.en: We should always be friendly to our neighbors.
sentences.zh: 我们应该总是对邻居友好。

sentences.en: Please take care of your little sister while I'm out.
sentences.zh: 我外出时请照顾好你的妹妹。

sentences.en: We should take care of the environment around us.
sentences.zh: 我们应该爱护我们周围的环境。

sentences.en: She stayed home because she felt ill.
sentences.zh: 她因为感觉不舒服待在了家里。

sentences.en: You should see a doctor if you are ill.
sentences.zh: 如果你生病了，应该去看医生。

sentences.en: Be careful not to drop the glass.
sentences.zh: 小心别把玻璃杯掉了。

sentences.en: The apple will drop from the tree when it's ripe.
sentences.zh: 苹果成熟时会从树上掉下来。

sentences.en: She is old enough to live an independent life.
sentences.zh: 她已经足够大，可以过独立的生活了。

sentences.en: We should learn to think independently.
sentences.zh: 我们应该学会独立思考。

sentences.en: The teacher always gives us fair grades.
sentences.zh: 这位老师总是给我们公正的分数。

sentences.en: It's not fair to let him do all the work alone.
sentences.zh: 让他一个人做所有工作是不公平的。

sentences.en: It is unfair to give him all the work.
sentences.zh: 把所有工作都给他是不公平的。

sentences.en: The teacher said the test result was unfair.
sentences.zh: 老师说这次考试结果不公平。

sentences.en: My parents allow me to watch TV after finishing homework.
sentences.zh: 我的父母允许我做完作业后看电视。

sentences.en: The teacher will allow us to have a break soon.
sentences.zh: 老师很快会允许我们休息一下。

sentences.en: I think I made a wrong decision yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我觉得我昨天做了一个错误的决定。

sentences.en: It's wrong to copy others' homework.
sentences.zh: 抄袭别人的作业是不对的。

sentences.en: Can you guess the answer to this question?
sentences.zh: 你能猜出这个问题的答案吗？

sentences.en: I guess it will rain tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我猜明天会下雨。

sentences.en: My parents made a deal to take me to the park if I finish homework.
sentences.zh: 我父母达成协议，如果我完成作业就带我去公园。

sentences.en: We can deal with this problem together after class.
sentences.zh: 课后我们可以一起处理这个问题。

sentences.en: It's no big deal if you make a small mistake.
sentences.zh: 如果你犯了个小错误，没什么大不了的。

sentences.en: Winning the game was a big deal for our team.
sentences.zh: 赢得这场比赛对我们队来说是件大事。

sentences.en: I need to work out this math problem before class.
sentences.zh: 我需要在上课前解出这道数学题。

sentences.en: We often work out together in the school gym after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我们经常一起在学校体育馆锻炼。

sentences.en: Let's get on with our homework after dinner.
sentences.zh: 晚饭后我们继续做家庭作业吧。

sentences.en: She decided to get on with her project despite the difficulties.
sentences.zh: 尽管有困难，她还是决定继续做她的项目。

sentences.en: The relation between friends should be based on trust.
sentences.zh: 朋友之间的关系应该建立在信任的基础上。

sentences.en: Can you explain the relation between the two events?
sentences.zh: 你能解释一下这两个事件之间的关系吗？

sentences.en: Good communication helps people understand each other better.
sentences.zh: 良好的沟通有助于人们更好地相互理解。

sentences.en: We learn communication skills in our English class.
sentences.zh: 我们在英语课上学习沟通技巧。

sentences.en: They often argue about which game to play.
sentences.zh: 他们经常为玩哪个游戏而争论。

sentences.en: You shouldn't argue with your parents.
sentences.zh: 你不应该和父母争吵。

sentences.en: The white cloud is floating in the blue sky.
sentences.zh: 白云在蓝天上飘浮。

sentences.en: We can see a big cloud over the mountain.
sentences.zh: 我们能看到山那边有一大片云。

sentences.en: My elder brother often helps me with my homework.
sentences.zh: 我的哥哥经常帮我做作业。

sentences.en: We should respect our elder family members.
sentences.zh: 我们应该尊敬家里的长辈。

sentences.en: I want tea instead of coffee.
sentences.zh: 我想要茶而不是咖啡。

sentences.en: She decided to walk instead of taking the bus.
sentences.zh: 她决定步行而不是坐公交车。

sentences.en: Whatever you choose, I will support you.
sentences.zh: 无论你选择什么，我都会支持你。

sentences.en: She can eat whatever she wants for dinner.
sentences.zh: 她晚餐想吃什么就能吃什么。

sentences.en: She felt nervous before the English exam.
sentences.zh: 英语考试前她感到紧张。

sentences.en: He always gets nervous when speaking in public.
sentences.zh: 他在公众场合讲话时总是很紧张。

sentences.en: She received a job offer from the company yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天收到了那家公司的工作邀请。

sentences.en: My parents offered to help me with my homework.
sentences.zh: 我的父母提出帮我辅导作业。

sentences.en: It's proper to say 'thank you' when someone helps you.
sentences.zh: 当有人帮助你时，说“谢谢”是恰当的。

sentences.en: We should wear proper clothes for the school party.
sentences.zh: 我们应该为学校派对穿合适的衣服。

sentences.en: Firstly, I finished my homework; secondly, I helped my mom with cooking.
sentences.zh: 首先，我完成了作业；其次，我帮妈妈做了饭。

sentences.en: We need to prepare two things: firstly, a notebook, and secondly, a pen.
sentences.zh: 我们需要准备两样东西：首先是一个笔记本，其次是一支笔。

sentences.en: We need to communicate with each other every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天都需要相互交流。

sentences.en: It's important to communicate your ideas clearly.
sentences.zh: 清晰地表达你的想法很重要。

sentences.en: Can you explain the math problem to me?
sentences.zh: 你能给我解释一下这道数学题吗？

sentences.en: The teacher used examples to explain the new word.
sentences.zh: 老师用例子来解释这个新单词。

sentences.en: The sky is clear and blue today.
sentences.zh: 今天天空晴朗湛蓝。

sentences.en: Please clear your desk before leaving.
sentences.zh: 离开前请整理好你的书桌。

sentences.en: Please copy the new words into your notebook.
sentences.zh: 请把这些新单词抄写到你的笔记本上。

sentences.en: Can you copy this picture for me?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我复制这张图片吗？

sentences.en: Please return the book to the library on time.
sentences.zh: 请按时把书归还给图书馆。

sentences.en: He said he would return home before dinner.
sentences.zh: 他说他会在晚饭前回家。

zh: （常用于否定句和疑问句末）再也（不）；（不）再

sentences.en: She doesn't live here anymore.
sentences.zh: 她不再住在这里了。

sentences.en: We can't play outside anymore because it's raining.
sentences.zh: 因为下雨，我们不能再在外面玩了。

sentences.en: He is an active member of the school football club.
sentences.zh: 他是学校足球俱乐部的活跃成员。

sentences.en: Every member in our class should help each other.
sentences.zh: 我们班的每个成员都应该互相帮助。

sentences.en: The teacher put pressure on us to finish the homework on time.
sentences.zh: 老师催促我们按时完成作业。

sentences.en: High blood pressure can be bad for your health.
sentences.zh: 高血压可能对你的健康有害。

sentences.en: We will compete with other classes in the sports meet.
sentences.zh: 我们将在运动会上和其他班级竞争。

sentences.en: You need to practice more to compete better.
sentences.zh: 你需要多练习才能更好地竞争。

sentences.en: Everyone has the right to express their opinion.
sentences.zh: 每个人都有表达自己观点的权利。

sentences.en: In class, we often discuss different opinions about books.
sentences.zh: 在课堂上，我们经常讨论关于书籍的不同观点。

sentences.en: Listening is an important skill for learning English.
sentences.zh: 听力是学习英语的一项重要技能。

sentences.en: She practices her piano skill every day after school.
sentences.zh: 她每天放学后都练习她的钢琴技能。

sentences.en: It is typical for students to do homework after school.
sentences.zh: 学生放学后做作业是很典型的。

sentences.en: Her typical breakfast includes milk and bread.
sentences.zh: 她通常的早餐包括牛奶和面包。

sentences.en: I often play football with my friends after school.
sentences.zh: 我经常放学后和朋友们踢足球。

sentences.en: Football is a popular sport in many countries around the world.
sentences.zh: 足球是世界上许多国家流行的运动。

sentences.en: Can you help me cut out this picture from the magazine?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我把这张图片从杂志上剪下来吗？

sentences.en: She used scissors to cut out a heart shape from the red paper.
sentences.zh: 她用剪刀从红纸上剪出了一个心形。

zh: 快的；迅速的；时间短暂的

sentences.en: He gave a quick answer to the teacher's question.
sentences.zh: 他快速回答了老师的问题。

sentences.en: We need to take a quick bus to catch the train.
sentences.zh: 我们需要乘快车去赶火车。

sentences.en: Please continue reading the book after lunch.
sentences.zh: 午饭后请继续读这本书。

sentences.en: Can you continue your story? We are all listening.
sentences.zh: 你能继续讲你的故事吗？我们都在听。

sentences.en: You can compare the two pictures and find the differences.
sentences.zh: 你可以比较这两张图片并找出不同之处。

sentences.en: Teachers often compare students' homework to check progress.
sentences.zh: 老师经常比较学生的作业来检查进度。

sentences.en: Compare with apples, oranges are usually sweeter.
sentences.zh: 和苹果相比，橙子通常更甜。

sentences.en: You should compare with your past self, not others.
sentences.zh: 你应该和过去的自己比较，而不是别人。

sentences.en: The kids went crazy when they saw the ice cream truck.
sentences.zh: 孩子们看到冰淇淋车时变得疯狂起来。

sentences.en: It's crazy to run in the rain without an umbrella.
sentences.zh: 没带伞在雨中跑真是太疯狂了。

sentences.en: Please push the door to open it.
sentences.zh: 请推开门把它打开。

sentences.en: He likes to push his little sister on the swing.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢推他的小妹妹荡秋千。

sentences.en: The development of new technology helps people work better.
sentences.zh: 新技术的发展帮助人们更好地工作。

sentences.en: Our school is planning the development of a new library.
sentences.zh: 我们学校正在规划新图书馆的建设。

sentences.en: Can you tell me the cause of the accident?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我事故的原因吗？

sentences.en: Heavy rain was the main cause of the flood.
sentences.zh: 大雨是洪水的主要原因。

sentences.en: He has a usual routine of reading books before bed.
sentences.zh: 他有睡前读书的日常习惯。

sentences.en: It's usual for students to do homework after school.
sentences.zh: 学生们放学后做作业是平常事。

sentences.en: In my opinion, English is an interesting subject.
sentences.zh: 在我看来，英语是一门有趣的学科。

sentences.en: They asked for my opinion on the new school rules.
sentences.zh: 他们征求我对新校规的看法。

sentences.en: Perhaps we can go to the park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 也许我们明天可以去公园。

sentences.en: She said she would perhaps join us for dinner.
sentences.zh: 她说她也许会和我们一起吃晚饭。

sentences.en: The rainstorm caused many trees to fall down.
sentences.zh: 暴雨导致许多树倒下了。

sentences.en: We stayed at home during the heavy rainstorm.
sentences.zh: 暴雨期间我们待在家里。

sentences.en: I set the alarm for 7 o'clock this morning.
sentences.zh: 我今天早上把闹钟设成了7点。

sentences.en: The alarm rang loudly and woke me up.
sentences.zh: 闹钟大声响起来，把我吵醒了。

sentences.en: The alarm clock will go off at 7 o'clock tomorrow morning.
sentences.zh: 闹钟明天早上7点会响。

sentences.en: The party went off well and everyone had a good time.
sentences.zh: 派对进行得很顺利，每个人都玩得很开心。

sentences.en: It rained heavily last night, so the ground is wet now.
sentences.zh: 昨晚雨下得很大，所以现在地面是湿的。

sentences.en: She heavily carried the big box up the stairs.
sentences.zh: 她费力地把那个大箱子搬上了楼梯。

sentences.en: It suddenly started to rain heavily.
sentences.zh: 天突然下起了大雨。

sentences.en: She suddenly realized she had left her keys at home.
sentences.zh: 她突然意识到自己把钥匙落在家里了。

sentences.en: Please pick up your pen and start writing.
sentences.zh: 请拿起你的笔开始写字。

sentences.en: Can you help me pick up the book from the floor?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我捡起地上的书吗？

sentences.en: There is a strange noise coming from the old house.
sentences.zh: 老房子里传来一种奇怪的声音。

sentences.en: She gave me a strange look when I told her the news.
sentences.zh: 当我告诉她这个消息时，她奇怪地看了我一眼。

sentences.en: The storm blew down many trees last night.
sentences.zh: 昨晚暴风雨吹倒了许多树。

sentences.en: We need to stay inside during the storm.
sentences.zh: 暴风雨期间我们需要待在室内。

sentences.en: The wind is blowing gently through the trees.
sentences.zh: 风正轻轻地吹过树林。

sentences.en: We need to close the window because the wind is strong.
sentences.zh: 我们需要关上窗户，因为风很大。

sentences.en: The sun gives us light and heat every day.
sentences.zh: 太阳每天给我们光和热。

sentences.en: Please turn on the light when it gets dark.
sentences.zh: 天黑时请把灯打开。

sentences.en: Our teacher asked us to write a report about our summer holiday.
sentences.zh: 我们老师让我们写一篇关于暑假的报告。

sentences.en: The scientist will give a report on her new research tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 这位科学家明天将做关于她新研究的报告。

sentences.en: This area is famous for its beautiful parks.
sentences.zh: 这个地区以其美丽的公园而闻名。

sentences.en: We need to clean the area before the guests arrive.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在客人到达前打扫这个区域。

sentences.en: The table is made of wood.
sentences.zh: 这张桌子是木制的。

sentences.en: We need to cut the wood into small pieces.
sentences.zh: 我们需要把木头切成小块。

sentences.en: The sun shines through the window.
sentences.zh: 阳光透过窗户照进来。

sentences.en: Please close the window before leaving.
sentences.zh: 离开前请关上窗户。

sentences.en: I need a flashlight to find my keys in the dark.
sentences.zh: 我需要一个手电筒在黑暗中找我的钥匙。

sentences.en: He turned on the flashlight and walked into the cave.
sentences.zh: 他打开手电筒，走进了山洞。

sentences.en: Can you match these socks?
sentences.zh: 你能把这些袜子配成对吗？

sentences.en: The two teams will match in the final game.
sentences.zh: 这两支队伍将在决赛中对决。

sentences.en: He likes to beat the drum in music class.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢在音乐课上打鼓。

sentences.en: Can you beat this high score in the game?
sentences.zh: 你能打破这个游戏的最高分吗？

sentences.en: We should fight against bad habits.
sentences.zh: 我们应该与坏习惯作斗争。

sentences.en: They are against the new school rule.
sentences.zh: 他们反对新的校规。

sentences.en: At first, I didn't understand the math problem.
sentences.zh: 起初，我不理解这道数学题。

sentences.en: She was nervous at first, but then she felt better.
sentences.zh: 她一开始很紧张，但后来感觉好多了。

sentences.en: The baby fell asleep in her mother's arms.
sentences.zh: 婴儿在妈妈怀里睡着了。

sentences.en: My cat is asleep on the warm blanket.
sentences.zh: 我的猫在暖和的毯子上睡着了。

sentences.en: I usually fall asleep quickly after reading a book.
sentences.zh: 我通常看完书后很快就能入睡。

sentences.en: It's hard to fall asleep when there's too much noise outside.
sentences.zh: 外面噪音太大时很难睡着。

sentences.en: The wind finally died down in the evening.
sentences.zh: 傍晚时分，风终于平息了。

sentences.en: After a few minutes, the noise in the classroom died down.
sentences.zh: 几分钟后，教室里的吵闹声渐渐消失了。

sentences.en: The sun will rise at 6 o'clock tomorrow morning.
sentences.zh: 明天早上六点太阳将升起。

sentences.en: Prices of fresh vegetables always rise in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬季新鲜蔬菜的价格总是上涨。

sentences.en: The leaves fallen on the ground look like a golden carpet.
sentences.zh: 落在地上的叶子看起来像一块金色的地毯。

sentences.en: He helped the old man pick up the fallen books.
sentences.zh: 他帮助老人捡起掉落的书。

sentences.en: The two friends decided to live apart after the argument.
sentences.zh: 那场争吵后，这两位朋友决定分开住。

sentences.en: We should keep the books apart from the food on the table.
sentences.zh: 我们应该把书和桌上的食物分开放。

sentences.en: Please have a look at this beautiful picture.
sentences.zh: 请看这张漂亮的图片。

sentences.en: Can you have a look at my homework and check for mistakes?
sentences.zh: 你能看一下我的作业并检查错误吗？

sentences.en: The icy road is very dangerous to drive on.
sentences.zh: 结冰的路面开车很危险。

sentences.en: Her hands felt icy cold in the winter wind.
sentences.zh: 她的手在冬日寒风中感到冰冷。

sentences.en: The little kid is playing happily in the park.
sentences.zh: 这个小孩正在公园里开心地玩耍。

sentences.en: My neighbor's kid likes to draw pictures of animals.
sentences.zh: 我邻居的孩子喜欢画动物的画。

sentences.en: I realize I forgot to bring my homework today.
sentences.zh: 我意识到我今天忘记带作业了。

sentences.en: She began to realize the importance of studying hard.
sentences.zh: 她开始意识到努力学习的重要性。

sentences.en: We made our way through the crowded street slowly.
sentences.zh: 我们慢慢地穿过拥挤的街道。

sentences.en: She made her way to the front of the classroom to answer the question.
sentences.zh: 她走到教室前面去回答问题。

sentences.en: The passage describes the beauty of the countryside.
sentences.zh: 这篇文章描述了乡村的美丽。

sentences.en: He read the passage aloud to the class.
sentences.zh: 他将这篇文章大声朗读给全班同学听。

sentences.en: The pupil solved the math problem quickly.
sentences.zh: 这个小学生很快解出了这道数学题。

sentences.en: She noticed a bright pupil in the cat's eye.
sentences.zh: 她注意到猫眼中有一颗明亮的瞳孔。

sentences.en: I completely finished my homework before dinner.
sentences.zh: 我在晚饭前彻底完成了作业。

sentences.en: She was completely surprised by the unexpected gift.
sentences.zh: 她对这份意外的礼物感到完全惊讶。

sentences.en: She looked shocked when she heard the news.
sentences.zh: 听到这个消息时，她看起来很震惊。

sentences.en: I was shocked to see the big dog in the park.
sentences.zh: 在公园里看到那只大狗，我感到很震惊。

sentences.en: The room was filled with silence after the teacher left.
sentences.zh: 老师离开后，房间里一片寂静。

sentences.en: We need silence when studying in the library.
sentences.zh: 在图书馆学习时我们需要安静。

sentences.en: They walked home in silence after the argument.
sentences.zh: 争吵过后，他们默默地走回了家。

sentences.en: The library was so quiet that we had to work in silence.
sentences.zh: 图书馆非常安静，我们不得不安静地工作。

sentences.en: I have finished my homework recently.
sentences.zh: 我最近完成了我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: She has visited the park twice recently.
sentences.zh: 她最近去过那个公园两次。

sentences.en: Please take down the notes carefully in class.
sentences.zh: 请在课堂上认真记下笔记。

sentences.en: He asked me to take down his phone number.
sentences.zh: 他让我写下他的电话号码。

sentences.en: The police worked hard to catch the terrorist.
sentences.zh: 警察努力抓捕恐怖分子。

sentences.en: We must fight against terrorist activities.
sentences.zh: 我们必须打击恐怖主义活动。

sentences.en: What's the date today?
sentences.zh: 今天是几号？

sentences.en: My birthday is on the date of October 1st.
sentences.zh: 我的生日是10月1日。

sentences.en: We can see a tall tower on the hill.
sentences.zh: 我们能看到山上有一座高塔。

sentences.en: The bell in the tower rings every hour.
sentences.zh: 塔里的钟每小时响一次。

sentences.en: We should always tell the truth to our parents.
sentences.zh: 我们应该总是对父母说实话。

sentences.en: The truth of the story made everyone sad.
sentences.zh: 这个故事的真相让每个人都很难过。

sentences.en: He likes to shoot baskets in the park after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后他喜欢在公园里投篮。

sentences.en: You should never shoot a gun without an adult's help.
sentences.zh: 没有成年人的帮助，你绝对不应该开枪。

sentences.en: The boy found a smooth stone near the river.
sentences.zh: 那个男孩在河边发现了一块光滑的石头。

sentences.en: We used stones to build a small house for the rabbits.
sentences.zh: 我们用石头给兔子们建了一个小房子。

sentences.en: She felt weak after running for a long time.
sentences.zh: 长时间跑步后她感到虚弱。

sentences.en: The old bridge looks weak and may not be safe.
sentences.zh: 这座旧桥看起来不牢固，可能不安全。

sentences.en: Many people believe in God and pray every day.
sentences.zh: 许多人信仰上帝，每天都祈祷。

sentences.en: In some stories, God helps people when they are in trouble.
sentences.zh: 在一些故事中，上帝在人们遇到困难时帮助他们。

sentences.en: Please remind me to do homework after school.
sentences.zh: 请提醒我放学后做作业。

sentences.en: My mother always reminds me to wear a coat in winter.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈总是提醒我冬天要穿外套。

sentences.en: A bit of sugar can make the coffee taste better.
sentences.zh: 一点糖能让咖啡更好喝。

sentences.en: I feel a bit tired after playing basketball for an hour.
sentences.zh: 打了一个小时篮球后，我感觉有点累。

sentences.en: I'm a little bit tired after running.
sentences.zh: 跑步后我有点累。

sentences.en: This dress is a little bit too big for me.
sentences.zh: 这条裙子对我来说有点太大了。

sentences.en: It's silly to cry over such a small thing.
sentences.zh: 为这么小的事情哭太傻了。

sentences.en: He made a silly mistake in the math test.
sentences.zh: 他在数学考试中犯了一个愚蠢的错误。

sentences.en: I will have tea instead of coffee this morning.
sentences.zh: 今天早上我要喝茶而不是咖啡。

sentences.en: We walked to school instead of taking the bus.
sentences.zh: 我们步行去学校而不是坐公交车。

sentences.en: We can turn into a team to finish the project.
sentences.zh: 我们可以组成一个团队来完成这个项目。

sentences.en: Water can turn into ice when it is very cold.
sentences.zh: 天气非常冷的时候，水会变成冰。

sentences.en: The main object of our meeting is to discuss the new project.
sentences.zh: 我们会议的主要目的是讨论新项目。

sentences.en: She found an unusual object on the beach.
sentences.zh: 她在海滩上发现了一个不寻常的物体。

sentences.en: She tried to hide her smile with her hand.
sentences.zh: 她试图用手遮住笑容。

sentences.en: The cat likes to hide under the sofa.
sentences.zh: 猫喜欢藏在沙发下面。

sentences.en: The cat is chasing the dog's tail.
sentences.zh: 猫正在追狗的尾巴。

sentences.en: Please sign your name at the tail of the letter.
sentences.zh: 请在信的末尾签上你的名字。

zh: 有魔力的；有神奇力量的

sentences.en: The magician showed us some amazing magic tricks.
sentences.zh: 魔术师给我们表演了一些精彩的魔术。

sentences.en: In fairy tales, magic can make dreams come true.
sentences.zh: 在童话故事里，魔法能让梦想成真。

sentences.en: I used glue to stick the picture on the wall.
sentences.zh: 我用胶水把画粘在了墙上。

sentences.en: Stick your name on the front of your notebook.
sentences.zh: 把你的名字贴在笔记本的封面上。

sentences.en: I am excited to go to the amusement park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 明天要去游乐园，我很兴奋。

sentences.en: Her eyes looked excited when she heard the good news.
sentences.zh: 听到这个好消息时，她的眼神看起来很兴奋。

zh: 西方国家的；（尤指）欧美的；西方的（w可以小写）

sentences.en: Western culture is different from Eastern culture in many ways.
sentences.zh: 西方文化在很多方面与东方文化不同。

sentences.en: They like watching Western movies on weekends.
sentences.zh: 他们喜欢在周末看西部电影。

sentences.en: Once upon a time, there was a kind girl living in a small village.
sentences.zh: 从前，有一个善良的女孩住在一个小村庄里。

sentences.en: My grandmother likes to tell me stories that start with 'once upon a time'.
sentences.zh: 我的奶奶喜欢给我讲以“从前”开头的故事。

sentences.en: My stepsister and I often play games together after school.
sentences.zh: 我同父异母（或同母异父）的姐姐/妹妹和我放学后经常一起玩游戏。

sentences.en: She introduced her stepsister to all her new classmates.
sentences.zh: 她把她的继姐/继妹介绍给了所有新同学。

sentences.en: The prince lived in a beautiful castle with his family.
sentences.zh: 王子和他的家人住在一座漂亮的城堡里。

sentences.en: The kind prince helped the poor girl find her lost cat.
sentences.zh: 善良的王子帮助那个可怜的女孩找到了她丢失的猫。

sentences.en: They began to fall in love when they met at school.
sentences.zh: 他们在学校相遇时开始相爱。

sentences.en: It's beautiful to see two people fall in love gradually.
sentences.zh: 看到两个人逐渐相爱是很美好的。

sentences.en: This shirt doesn't fit me well.
sentences.zh: 这件衬衫不太适合我。

sentences.en: We need to fit the pieces together to complete the puzzle.
sentences.zh: 我们需要把碎片拼在一起完成拼图。

sentences.en: The young couple walked hand in hand in the park.
sentences.zh: 这对年轻夫妇手牵手在公园里散步。

sentences.en: My parents are a happy couple who love traveling.
sentences.zh: 我的父母是一对热爱旅行的幸福夫妇。

sentences.en: She always has a smile on her face.
sentences.zh: 她脸上总是带着微笑。

sentences.en: A smile can make people feel warm.
sentences.zh: 一个微笑能让人感到温暖。

sentences.en: She wants to marry a kind and honest man.
sentences.zh: 她想嫁给一个善良诚实的男人。

sentences.en: My parents will marry next month and have a big party.
sentences.zh: 我的父母下个月结婚，并会举办一场盛大的派对。

sentences.en: Many people dream to get married in a beautiful church.
sentences.zh: 许多人梦想在漂亮的教堂结婚。

sentences.en: My parents will help me plan when I get married.
sentences.zh: 当我结婚时，我的父母会帮我策划。

sentences.en: Gold is a precious metal that shines brightly.
sentences.zh: 黄金是一种闪闪发光的贵金属。

sentences.en: She wears a gold necklace around her neck.
sentences.zh: 她脖子上戴着一条金项链。

sentences.en: The emperor ruled his kingdom wisely.
sentences.zh: 这位皇帝明智地统治着他的王国。

sentences.en: People in ancient China respected their emperor very much.
sentences.zh: 古代中国的人们非常尊敬他们的皇帝。

sentences.en: The beautiful scarf is made of silk.
sentences.zh: 这条漂亮的围巾是丝绸做的。

sentences.en: Silk feels soft and smooth against the skin.
sentences.zh: 丝绸贴在皮肤上感觉柔软光滑。

sentences.en: You should change your underwear every day to keep clean.
sentences.zh: 为了保持清洁，你应该每天更换内衣。

sentences.en: My mom bought me a new set of underwear yesterday.
sentences.zh: 妈妈昨天给我买了一套新内衣。

sentences.en: Nobody is in the classroom now.
sentences.zh: 现在教室里没有人。

sentences.en: She said nobody could help her with the problem.
sentences.zh: 她说没有人能帮她解决这个问题。

sentences.en: It's stupid to play in the rain without an umbrella.
sentences.zh: 不带伞在雨中玩耍是愚蠢的。

sentences.en: He felt stupid when he forgot his own birthday.
sentences.zh: 当他忘记自己的生日时，他觉得很愚蠢。

sentences.en: It's wrong to cheat in the exam.
sentences.zh: 考试作弊是不对的。

sentences.en: He tried to cheat his friend out of money.
sentences.zh: 他试图骗取朋友的钱。

sentences.en: Her stepmother always helps her with homework.
sentences.zh: 她的继母总是帮她辅导作业。

sentences.en: The boy lives happily with his father and stepmother.
sentences.zh: 这个男孩和爸爸、继母幸福地生活在一起。

sentences.en: My wife is good at cooking delicious meals.
sentences.zh: 我的妻子擅长做美味的饭菜。

sentences.en: He bought a beautiful necklace for his wife on their anniversary.
sentences.zh: 他在结婚纪念日给他的妻子买了一条漂亮的项链。

sentences.en: My husband often helps me with housework.
sentences.zh: 我的丈夫经常帮我做家务。

sentences.en: Her husband is a doctor in a big hospital.
sentences.zh: 她的丈夫是一家大医院的医生。

sentences.en: I need to read the whole book before Friday.
sentences.zh: 我需要在周五之前读完整本书。

sentences.en: The whole class went on a trip to the zoo.
sentences.zh: 全班同学都去动物园郊游了。

sentences.en: The sunset at the beach is a beautiful scene.
sentences.zh: 海滩上的日落是一幅美丽的景象。

sentences.en: We watched a funny scene from the movie.
sentences.zh: 我们看了电影里的一个有趣场景。

sentences.en: The moonlight shone through the window and照亮了房间。
sentences.zh: 月光透过窗户照进来，照亮了房间。

sentences.en: We walked along the beach under the beautiful moonlight.
sentences.zh: 我们在美丽的月光下沿着沙滩散步。

sentences.en: The sun begins to shine brightly in the morning.
sentences.zh: 早晨太阳开始明亮地照耀。

sentences.en: Her smile can always shine like a star.
sentences.zh: 她的微笑总能像星星一样闪耀。

sentences.en: The bright sun shines brightly in the sky.
sentences.zh: 明亮的太阳在天空中灿烂地照耀着。

sentences.en: Her eyes are as bright as stars.
sentences.zh: 她的眼睛像星星一样明亮。

sentences.en: The children are playing games on the ground.
sentences.zh: 孩子们正在地上玩游戏。

sentences.en: We sat down on the soft ground under the tree.
sentences.zh: 我们在树下柔软的地上坐了下来。

sentences.en: The lead actor in the movie is very famous.
sentences.zh: 这部电影的主角非常有名。

sentences.en: Please use a pencil with a soft lead for drawing.
sentences.zh: 请用软铅笔芯画画。

sentences.en: Her voice sounds very sweet.
sentences.zh: 她的声音听起来很甜。

sentences.en: I couldn't hear his voice clearly on the phone.
sentences.zh: 我在电话里听不清他的声音。

sentences.en: The little girl was brave enough to help the old man cross the street.
sentences.zh: 这个小女孩很勇敢，帮助老人过马路。

sentences.en: He tried to be brave when he went to the dentist for the first time.
sentences.zh: 第一次去看牙医时，他努力表现得很勇敢。

sentences.en: There is a red square in the middle of the park.
sentences.zh: 公园中央有一个红色的广场。

sentences.en: Draw a square with four equal sides and four right angles.
sentences.zh: 画一个有四条等边和四个直角的正方形。

sentences.en: The water meter shows how much water we use every month.
sentences.zh: 水表显示我们每个月用多少水。

sentences.en: He checked the gas meter to see if there was any gas left.
sentences.zh: 他查看了煤气表，看看是否还有煤气。

sentences.en: The river is very deep, so we can't swim here.
sentences.zh: 这条河很深，所以我们不能在这里游泳。

sentences.en: He has a deep love for his family.
sentences.zh: 他对家人有着深厚的爱。

sentences.en: Camels can live for a long time in the desert without water.
sentences.zh: 骆驼能在沙漠中长时间不喝水生存。

sentences.en: We saw many cacti when we traveled through the desert.
sentences.zh: 我们穿越沙漠时看到了很多仙人掌。

sentences.en: The population of this city is over one million.
sentences.zh: 这座城市的人口超过一百万。

sentences.en: China has the largest population in the world.
sentences.zh: 中国是世界上人口最多的国家。

sentences.en: Asia is the largest continent in the world.
sentences.zh: 亚洲是世界上最大的洲。

sentences.en: Many different cultures can be found in Asia.
sentences.zh: 在亚洲可以发现许多不同的文化。

sentences.en: Feel free to ask me any questions you have.
sentences.zh: 你有任何问题都可以随便问我。

sentences.en: You can feel free to use the books on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 你可以随便用书架上的书。

sentences.en: We are planning a tour to the mountains this summer.
sentences.zh: 我们计划今年夏天去山区旅行。

sentences.en: The guide showed us around during the city tour.
sentences.zh: 在城市游览期间，导游带我们四处参观。

sentences.en: The tourist took many photos of the beautiful scenery.
sentences.zh: 这位游客拍了许多美丽风景的照片。

sentences.en: We met a friendly tourist from Australia at the museum.
sentences.zh: 我们在博物馆遇到了一位来自澳大利亚的友好游客。

sentences.en: There is a red clock on the wall.
sentences.zh: 墙上有一个红色的时钟。

sentences.en: We should not write on the wall.
sentences.zh: 我们不应该在墙上写字。

zh: 令人大为惊奇的；令人惊喜（或惊叹、惊羡）的

sentences.en: The view from the mountain top is amazing.
sentences.zh: 山顶的景色令人惊叹。

sentences.en: She showed us an amazing magic trick yesterday.
sentences.zh: 昨天她给我们表演了一个令人惊奇的魔术。

sentences.en: We learned about ancient Egypt in history class.
sentences.zh: 我们在历史课上学习了古埃及。

sentences.en: The ancient castle on the hill is over 500 years old.
sentences.zh: 山上的那座古堡有500多年的历史了。

sentences.en: We should protect animals in danger.
sentences.zh: 我们应该保护濒危动物。

sentences.en: Please protect your eyes when reading.
sentences.zh: 阅读时请保护你的眼睛。

sentences.en: The river is wide and clear.
sentences.zh: 这条河又宽又清澈。

sentences.en: We need a wide road for the cars to pass.
sentences.zh: 我们需要一条宽马路让汽车通行。

sentences.en: As far as I know, the library opens at 9 a.m.
sentences.zh: 据我所知，图书馆上午9点开门。

sentences.en: As far as I know, Tom likes playing basketball very much.
sentences.zh: 据我所知，汤姆非常喜欢打篮球。

sentences.en: The Great Wall is a famous man-made wonder in China.
sentences.zh: 长城是中国著名的人工奇迹。

sentences.en: We should protect man-made lakes from pollution.
sentences.zh: 我们应该保护人工湖免受污染。

sentences.en: Winning the race was a great achievement for him.
sentences.zh: 赢得比赛对他来说是一项了不起的成就。

sentences.en: We should be proud of our small achievements in daily life.
sentences.zh: 我们应该为日常生活中的小成就感到骄傲。

sentences.en: The southwestern part of China has beautiful mountains and rivers.
sentences.zh: 中国的西南部有美丽的山川。

sentences.en: We are planning a trip to the southwestern states of America.
sentences.zh: 我们正计划去美国的西南部各州旅行。

sentences.en: The book on the desk is thick.
sentences.zh: 桌上的书很厚。

sentences.en: Winter clothes are usually thick and warm.
sentences.zh: 冬天的衣服通常又厚又暖和。

sentences.en: My bag can include many books and a pencil case.
sentences.zh: 我的书包能装下很多书和一个铅笔盒。

sentences.en: This lesson will include some easy grammar exercises.
sentences.zh: 这节课将包含一些简单的语法练习。

sentences.en: It's freezing outside, so remember to wear a thick coat.
sentences.zh: 外面很冷，所以记得穿厚外套。

sentences.en: The freezing wind made her hands turn red.
sentences.zh: 刺骨的寒风把她的手吹红了。

sentences.en: The doctor checked his condition carefully.
sentences.zh: 医生仔细检查了他的状况。

sentences.en: Exercise can improve your physical condition.
sentences.zh: 运动可以改善你的身体状况。

sentences.en: We need to take in enough water every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天需要摄入足够的水。

sentences.en: The small hotel can take in about 50 guests.
sentences.zh: 这家小旅馆能容纳大约50位客人。

sentences.en: If you work hard, you will succeed in the exam.
sentences.zh: 如果你努力学习，你会在考试中取得成功。

sentences.en: She tried many times and finally succeeded.
sentences.zh: 她尝试了很多次，最终成功了。

sentences.en: Learning English well is a big challenge for many students.
sentences.zh: 学好英语对很多学生来说是一个大挑战。

sentences.en: We should try our best to face every challenge in life.
sentences.zh: 我们应该尽力面对生活中的每一个挑战。

sentences.en: We should stay brave in the face of difficulties.
sentences.zh: 面对困难时我们应该保持勇敢。

sentences.en: In the face of danger, he tried to keep calm.
sentences.zh: 面对危险，他努力保持冷静。

sentences.en: We can achieve our dreams if we work hard.
sentences.zh: 如果我们努力学习，就能实现我们的梦想。

sentences.en: She wants to achieve good grades in the exam.
sentences.zh: 她想在考试中取得好成绩。

sentences.en: He used all his force to push the heavy box.
sentences.zh: 他用尽全力推那个重箱子。

sentences.en: The force of the wind closed the door suddenly.
sentences.zh: 风的力量突然把门关上了。

sentences.en: We should protect nature and keep it clean.
sentences.zh: 我们应该保护自然并保持它的清洁。

sentences.en: Many animals live in nature and depend on forests.
sentences.zh: 许多动物生活在大自然中，依赖森林生存。

sentences.en: Even though it rained heavily, we still went to the park.
sentences.zh: 尽管雨下得很大，我们还是去了公园。

sentences.en: She finished her homework on time even though she felt tired.
sentences.zh: 尽管她感到疲倦，还是按时完成了作业。

sentences.en: The blue ocean is full of colorful fish.
sentences.zh: 蓝色的海洋里充满了五颜六色的鱼。

sentences.en: We often go swimming in the ocean during summer vacation.
sentences.zh: 我们暑假经常去海里游泳。

sentences.en: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean in the world.
sentences.zh: 太平洋是世界上最大的海洋。

sentences.en: Many ships sail across the Pacific Ocean every year.
sentences.zh: 每年有许多船只横渡太平洋。

sentences.en: The distance from my home to school is about 500 cm.
sentences.zh: 我家到学校的距离大约是500厘米。

sentences.en: This ruler is 30 cm long.
sentences.zh: 这把尺子长30厘米。

sentences.en: How much does this apple weigh?
sentences.zh: 这个苹果重多少？

sentences.en: You should weigh yourself every week to track your health.
sentences.zh: 你应该每周称一下体重来追踪健康状况。

sentences.en: My sister's birth date is in July.
sentences.zh: 我妹妹的生日在七月。

sentences.en: We celebrate the birth of our country on National Day.
sentences.zh: 我们在国庆节庆祝国家的诞生。

sentences.en: A baby's weight at birth is usually between 2.5 and 4 kilograms.
sentences.zh: 婴儿出生时的体重通常在2.5到4公斤之间。

sentences.en: The doctor noted the baby's health condition at birth.
sentences.zh: 医生记录了婴儿出生时的健康状况。

zh: 到达（某数量、程度等）；至多有；不多于

sentences.en: The party can have up to 20 people.
sentences.zh: 这个派对最多能有20人。

sentences.en: I can walk up to the park in 10 minutes.
sentences.zh: 我能在10分钟内走到公园。

sentences.en: An adult should take care of children.
sentences.zh: 成年人应该照顾孩子。

sentences.en: My sister is now an adult and has her own job.
sentences.zh: 我的姐姐现在是成年人了，并且有了自己的工作。

sentences.en: Pandas like eating bamboo very much.
sentences.zh: 熊猫非常喜欢吃竹子。

sentences.en: The house is built with bamboo.
sentences.zh: 这座房子是用竹子建造的。

sentences.en: The panda is an endangered animal in China.
sentences.zh: 熊猫是中国的一种濒危动物。

sentences.en: We should try to protect endangered plants.
sentences.zh: 我们应该努力保护濒危植物。

zh: 研究；调查（用作名词时，重音可放在第一个音节）

sentences.en: We need to do research before writing the report.
sentences.zh: 写报告前我们需要做研究。

sentences.en: Her research on plants helps farmers grow better crops.
sentences.zh: 她对植物的研究帮助农民种出更好的庄稼。

sentences.en: The zookeeper feeds the animals every morning.
sentences.zh: 动物园管理员每天早上喂动物。

sentences.en: You need a password to be the keeper of this account.
sentences.zh: 你需要密码才能成为这个账户的守护者。

sentences.en: I usually awake at 7 o'clock in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我通常早上7点醒来。

sentences.en: The sound of birds made her awake from the dream.
sentences.zh: 鸟叫声使她从梦中醒来。

sentences.en: Her eyes shone with excitement when she heard the good news.
sentences.zh: 听到这个好消息时，她的眼睛里闪烁着兴奋的光芒。

sentences.en: The children jumped up and down with excitement at the party.
sentences.zh: 孩子们在派对上兴奋地跳来跳去。

sentences.en: We walk into the classroom every morning.
sentences.zh: 我们每天早上走进教室。

sentences.en: He saw a cat walk into the garden quietly.
sentences.zh: 他看见一只猫悄悄地走进花园。

sentences.en: The little girl tried to run fast but fell over.
sentences.zh: 那个小女孩试图快跑，但是摔倒了。

sentences.en: Be careful not to fall over the stone on the road.
sentences.zh: 小心不要被路上的石头绊倒。

sentences.en: We need to wait for ten minutes or so.
sentences.zh: 我们需要等十分钟左右。

sentences.en: There are thirty students or so in our class.
sentences.zh: 我们班大约有三十名学生。

sentences.en: She stayed at home because of her illness.
sentences.zh: 她因为生病待在家里。

sentences.en: Eating healthy food can help prevent illness.
sentences.zh: 吃健康的食物有助于预防疾病。

sentences.en: We saw a wild rabbit run across the field.
sentences.zh: 我们看见一只野兔跑过田野。

sentences.en: The children love exploring the wild forest.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢探索这片野生森林。

sentences.en: The government helps people solve many problems.
sentences.zh: 政府帮助人们解决许多问题。

sentences.en: Our government works hard to make the city better.
sentences.zh: 我们的政府努力工作使城市变得更好。

sentences.en: The blue whale is the largest animal in the world.
sentences.zh: 蓝鲸是世界上最大的动物。

sentences.en: We saw a huge whale swimming near the boat.
sentences.zh: 我们看到一头巨大的鲸鱼在船附近游。

sentences.en: Cars need oil to run smoothly.
sentences.zh: 汽车需要油才能平稳行驶。

sentences.en: My mother uses oil when cooking meals.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈做饭时会用油。

sentences.en: Wearing a helmet is important for the protection of your head.
sentences.zh: 戴头盔对保护你的头部很重要。

sentences.en: We need to take action for the protection of wild animals.
sentences.zh: 我们需要采取行动保护野生动物。

sentences.en: There is a huge tree in front of our school.
sentences.zh: 我们学校前面有一棵大树。

sentences.en: She has a huge collection of storybooks.
sentences.zh: 她有大量的故事书收藏。

sentences.en: The children found a box of treasure under the old tree.
sentences.zh: 孩子们在那棵老树下发现了一箱财宝。

sentences.en: My grandma says her best treasure is our family photos.
sentences.zh: 我奶奶说她最珍贵的宝物是我们的家庭照片。

sentences.en: We spent our summer holiday on a small island.
sentences.zh: 我们在一个小岛上度过了暑假。

sentences.en: There are many beautiful beaches on the island.
sentences.zh: 这个岛上有许多美丽的海滩。

zh: 满是⋯⋯的；（有）大量的；（有）丰富的

sentences.en: The basket is full of fresh apples.
sentences.zh: 这个篮子装满了新鲜的苹果。

sentences.en: Her eyes are full of happiness when she smiles.
sentences.zh: 她微笑时眼里充满了快乐。

sentences.en: My grandfather likes listening to classic music.
sentences.zh: 我的爷爷喜欢听古典音乐。

sentences.en: This is a classic story that many children love.
sentences.zh: 这是一个许多孩子都喜欢的经典故事。

sentences.en: Please turn to page 10 in your textbook.
sentences.zh: 请翻到课本的第10页。

sentences.en: I wrote my name at the top of the page.
sentences.zh: 我把我的名字写在了这一页的顶部。

sentences.en: Hurry up, or we will miss the school bus.
sentences.zh: 快点，否则我们会错过校车。

sentences.en: She asked me to hurry because the class was about to start.
sentences.zh: 她让我快点，因为马上要上课了。

sentences.en: Hurry up, or we will miss the school bus.
sentences.zh: 快点，否则我们会错过校车。

sentences.en: My mom always tells me to hurry up when I'm late for class.
sentences.zh: 当我上课迟到时，妈妈总是叫我快点。

sentences.en: Your homework is due tomorrow morning.
sentences.zh: 你的作业明天早上到期。

sentences.en: The library books are due in two weeks.
sentences.zh: 图书馆的书两周后到期。

sentences.en: We can take a ship to cross the sea.
sentences.zh: 我们可以乘船渡海。

sentences.en: The big ship is sailing slowly into the harbor.
sentences.zh: 这艘大船正缓缓驶入港口。

sentences.en: A hammer is a useful tool for building things.
sentences.zh: 锤子是建造东西的有用工具。

sentences.en: We use a dictionary as a tool to learn new words.
sentences.zh: 我们把字典当作学习新单词的工具。

sentences.en: The police officer carries a gun to protect people.
sentences.zh: 警察携带枪来保护人们。

sentences.en: It is dangerous to play with a gun.
sentences.zh: 玩枪是很危险的。

sentences.en: Please mark your name on the paper.
sentences.zh: 请在纸上标记你的名字。

sentences.en: The teacher used a red pen to mark the correct answers.
sentences.zh: 老师用红笔标出了正确答案。

sentences.en: Children like to play in the sand on the beach.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在沙滩上玩沙子。

sentences.en: The wind blew the sand into my eyes.
sentences.zh: 风吹沙子进了我的眼睛。

sentences.en: The tribe in the story was said to be cannibal.
sentences.zh: 故事中的那个部落据说食人肉。

sentences.en: Legends sometimes tell of cannibal monsters in old forests.
sentences.zh: 传说中古老森林里有时会有食人的怪物。

sentences.en: She walked towards the park with her friends.
sentences.zh: 她和朋友们一起朝公园走去。

sentences.en: Our team is working towards a better result this year.
sentences.zh: 我们团队正朝着今年取得更好成绩的目标努力。

sentences.en: We like to play on the green land.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢在绿色的土地上玩耍。

sentences.en: The farmer works hard on his land every day.
sentences.zh: 这位农民每天在他的田地上辛勤劳作。

sentences.en: She enjoys reading fiction books before going to bed.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢睡前读小说书。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to write a short fiction story about our dreams.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们写一个关于自己梦想的短篇虚构故事。

sentences.en: I love reading science fiction books about space travel.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢读关于太空旅行的科幻小说。

sentences.en: The movie is a great example of science fiction with amazing robots.
sentences.zh: 这部电影是带有惊人机器人的科幻作品的绝佳例子。

sentences.en: Modern technology makes our life more convenient.
sentences.zh: 现代科技使我们的生活更加便捷。

sentences.en: We learn about new technology in science class.
sentences.zh: 我们在科学课上学习新技术。

sentences.en: My friend's mother speaks French very well.
sentences.zh: 我朋友的妈妈法语说得很好。

sentences.en: We learn French as a second language at school.
sentences.zh: 我们在学校把法语作为第二语言学习。

sentences.en: The balloon will pop if you squeeze it too hard.
sentences.zh: 如果你用力挤压气球，它会爆炸。

sentences.en: I heard a loud pop when the bubble burst.
sentences.zh: 泡泡破裂时，我听到了一声响亮的爆裂声。

sentences.en: He likes to climb the big rock in the park.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢爬公园里的那块大岩石。

sentences.en: The boat hit a rock and stopped moving.
sentences.zh: 船撞到了一块岩石，停了下来。

sentences.en: My favorite band will perform in our city next month.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的乐队下个月将在我们城市演出。

sentences.en: They formed a band to play music at school parties.
sentences.zh: 他们组建了一个乐队在学校聚会上演奏音乐。

sentences.en: I enjoy listening to country music with my family.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和家人一起听乡村音乐。

sentences.en: Country music often tells stories about rural life.
sentences.zh: 乡村音乐常常讲述乡村生活的故事。

sentences.en: Friendship can last forever if we care for each other.
sentences.zh: 如果我们互相关心，友谊可以天长地久。

sentences.en: My grandmother will love me forever.
sentences.zh: 我的奶奶会永远爱我。

sentences.en: My uncle works abroad and comes back once a year.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔在国外工作，每年回来一次。

sentences.en: Many students dream of studying abroad in the future.
sentences.zh: 许多学生梦想将来出国留学。

sentences.en: Actually, I like reading books more than watching TV.
sentences.zh: 事实上，比起看电视，我更喜欢读书。

sentences.en: He said he would help, but actually he was too busy.
sentences.zh: 他说他会帮忙，但实际上他太忙了。

sentences.en: I have loved reading ever since I was a child.
sentences.zh: 自从我小时候起，我就喜欢读书。

sentences.en: She has lived in this city ever since her family moved here.
sentences.zh: 自从她家搬到这里，她就一直住在这座城市。

sentences.en: He is a big fan of basketball and plays it every day.
sentences.zh: 他是个篮球迷，每天都打篮球。

sentences.en: My sister asked me to be her fan at the singing competition.
sentences.zh: 我姐姐让我在歌唱比赛中当她的粉丝。

sentences.en: The southern part of China is usually warmer in winter.
sentences.zh: 中国南方地区冬天通常更温暖。

sentences.en: We are planning a trip to the southern coast this summer.
sentences.zh: 我们计划今年夏天去南部海岸旅行。

sentences.en: Our school has a modern library with many new books.
sentences.zh: 我们学校有一个现代化的图书馆，里面有很多新书。

sentences.en: He likes to use modern technology in his daily life.
sentences.zh: 他喜欢在日常生活中使用现代科技。

sentences.en: Her hard work led to great success in the exam.
sentences.zh: 她的努力学习使她在考试中取得了巨大成功。

sentences.en: We all celebrated the team's success in winning the game.
sentences.zh: 我们都庆祝球队赢得比赛的成功。

sentences.en: Which class do you belong to?
sentences.zh: 你属于哪个班级？

sentences.en: These books belong on the top shelf.
sentences.zh: 这些书应该放在书架顶层。

sentences.en: We should help one another in times of difficulty.
sentences.zh: 我们在困难时应该互相帮助。

sentences.en: The children laughed and played with one another happily.
sentences.zh: 孩子们高兴地一起笑一起玩。

sentences.en: Her laughter filled the room with joy.
sentences.zh: 她的笑声使房间充满了欢乐。

sentences.en: We couldn't stop laughter when we heard the funny joke.
sentences.zh: 听到这个有趣的笑话，我们忍不住笑了起来。

sentences.en: The beauty of the sunset made us stop and take photos.
sentences.zh: 日落的美景让我们停下来拍照。

sentences.en: She has a natural beauty that doesn't need makeup.
sentences.zh: 她有一种无需化妆的自然美。

sentences.en: There are over a million people living in this city.
sentences.zh: 这座城市有超过一百万人口。

sentences.en: The company has sold millions of smartphones this year.
sentences.zh: 这家公司今年售出了数百万部智能手机。

sentences.en: You should record the important points in your notebook.
sentences.zh: 你应该在笔记本上记录重点。

sentences.en: This camera can record videos in high quality.
sentences.zh: 这台相机可以录制高质量的视频。

sentences.en: Let me introduce my friend to you.
sentences.zh: 让我把我的朋友介绍给你。

sentences.en: The teacher will introduce a new topic tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 老师明天将介绍一个新话题。

sentences.en: Please draw a straight line on the paper.
sentences.zh: 请在纸上画一条直线。

sentences.en: The line of students waited quietly for the bus.
sentences.zh: 学生们排成一队安静地等公交车。

sentences.en: We had great amusement at the funny movie.
sentences.zh: 我们从这部有趣的电影中获得了极大的乐趣。

sentences.en: Her favorite amusement is playing with her pet cat.
sentences.zh: 她最喜欢的娱乐活动是和她的宠物猫玩耍。

sentences.en: We are going to the amusement park this weekend.
sentences.zh: 我们这个周末要去游乐园。

sentences.en: Children love playing games in the amusement park.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在游乐园里玩游戏。

sentences.en: I left my keys somewhere in the house.
sentences.zh: 我把钥匙落在房子的某个地方了。

sentences.en: We need to find somewhere quiet to study.
sentences.zh: 我们需要找个安静的地方学习。

sentences.en: I use my camera to take photos of beautiful scenery.
sentences.zh: 我用我的相机拍摄美丽的风景照片。

sentences.en: Her father bought her a new camera for her birthday.
sentences.zh: 她爸爸给她买了一台新相机作为生日礼物。

sentences.en: The invention of the smartphone changed our daily life a lot.
sentences.zh: 智能手机的发明极大地改变了我们的日常生活。

sentences.en: Edison made many important inventions in his life.
sentences.zh: 爱迪生一生中有许多重要的发明。

sentences.en: Edison helped invent many useful things.
sentences.zh: 爱迪生帮助发明了许多有用的东西。

sentences.en: Can you invent a new game for us to play?
sentences.zh: 你能为我们发明一个新游戏来玩吗？

sentences.en: It's unbelievable that she finished the race in 10 minutes.
sentences.zh: 她十分钟内跑完了比赛，真是难以置信。

sentences.en: The magician's tricks were so unbelievable that everyone clapped.
sentences.zh: 魔术师的表演太令人难以置信了，所有人都鼓起了掌。

sentences.en: We are making good progress with our project.
sentences.zh: 我们的项目进展顺利。

sentences.en: She showed great progress in learning English this term.
sentences.zh: 这学期她在英语学习上取得了很大进步。

sentences.en: The car made a rapid turn at the corner.
sentences.zh: 汽车在拐角处快速转弯。

sentences.en: She has made rapid progress in her English study.
sentences.zh: 她在英语学习上取得了快速进步。

sentences.en: She has an unusual hobby of collecting old stamps.
sentences.zh: 她有一个收集旧邮票的不寻常爱好。

sentences.en: It is unusual to see snow in this city in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天在这个城市看到雪是不寻常的。

sentences.en: Excuse me, where is the toilet?
sentences.zh: 打扰一下，洗手间在哪里？

sentences.en: Remember to flush the toilet after use.
sentences.zh: 使用后记得冲马桶。

sentences.en: My teacher always encourages us to try new things.
sentences.zh: 我的老师总是鼓励我们尝试新事物。

sentences.en: You should encourage your friend when he feels sad.
sentences.zh: 当朋友感到难过时，你应该鼓励他。

sentences.en: We have a social studies class every Monday.
sentences.zh: 我们每周一有一节社会研究课。

sentences.en: She enjoys social activities like parties and sports.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢聚会和运动之类的社交活动。

sentences.en: The park is a peaceful place to read books.
sentences.zh: 这个公园是个安静看书的好地方。

sentences.en: We spent a peaceful afternoon by the lake.
sentences.zh: 我们在湖边度过了一个宁静的下午。

sentences.en: We learned about tea art in our culture class today.
sentences.zh: 我们今天在文化课上学习了茶艺。

sentences.en: My grandma often performs tea art for guests at home.
sentences.zh: 我奶奶经常在家为客人表演茶艺。

sentences.en: Her performance in the play was excellent.
sentences.zh: 她在剧中的表演非常出色。

sentences.en: We need to improve our team's performance.
sentences.zh: 我们需要提高我们团队的表现。

sentences.en: Her English pronunciation is perfect.
sentences.zh: 她的英语发音很完美。

sentences.en: We had a perfect day at the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 昨天我们在公园度过了完美的一天。

sentences.en: My grandmother has a beautiful tea set for guests.
sentences.zh: 我奶奶有一套漂亮的茶具招待客人。

sentences.en: We bought a new tea set as a gift for my aunt.
sentences.zh: 我们买了一套新茶具作为给我阿姨的礼物。

sentences.en: The cat cleaned itself carefully.
sentences.zh: 这只猫仔细地给自己梳理毛发。

sentences.en: The machine can start by itself when you press the button.
sentences.zh: 当你按下按钮时，这台机器能自己启动。

sentences.en: We need to collect enough information for the project.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为这个项目收集足够的信息。

sentences.en: She likes to collect stamps from different countries.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢收集来自不同国家的邮票。

sentences.en: I need a couple of pencils for drawing.
sentences.zh: 我需要几支铅笔来画画。

sentences.en: We waited for a couple of minutes before the bus came.
sentences.zh: 我们等了几分钟公交车才来。

zh: 德国的；德语的；德国人的

sentences.en: My friend is learning German at school.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友正在学校学习德语。

sentences.en: German is spoken in Germany and Austria.
sentences.zh: 德语在德国和奥地利被使用。

sentences.en: Our class discussed the theme of the story yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们班昨天讨论了这个故事的主题。

sentences.en: The theme of the party is 'Under the Sea'.
sentences.zh: 这个派对的主题是“海底世界”。

zh: 供乘骑的游乐设施；短途旅程

sentences.en: I often ride my bike to school in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我早上经常骑自行车去上学。

sentences.en: Can you ride a horse? It looks so fun!
sentences.zh: 你会骑马吗？看起来太有趣了！

sentences.en: Guangdong is a province in southern China.
sentences.zh: 广东省是中国南部的一个省。

sentences.en: She comes from a small town in that province.
sentences.zh: 她来自那个省的一个小镇。

sentences.en: There are about a thousand students in our school.
sentences.zh: 我们学校大约有一千名学生。

sentences.en: She saved a thousand dollars to buy a new bike.
sentences.zh: 她存了一千美元买一辆新自行车。

zh: 数以千计的；许许多多的

sentences.en: Thousands of people visit the park every weekend.
sentences.zh: 每个周末都有成千上万的人参观这个公园。

sentences.en: There are thousands of stars in the night sky.
sentences.zh: 夜空中有数千颗星星。

en: on the one hand on the other hand

sentences.en: On the one hand, I like playing basketball; on the other hand, I also enjoy reading books.
sentences.zh: 一方面，我喜欢打篮球；另一方面，我也喜欢看书。

sentences.en: On the one hand, studying hard is important; on the other hand, getting enough rest is necessary too.
sentences.zh: 一方面，努力学习很重要；另一方面，充足的休息也很必要。

sentences.en: It's safe to cross the road when the light is green.
sentences.zh: 绿灯亮的时候过马路是安全的。

sentences.en: Wearing a helmet keeps you safe while riding a bike.
sentences.zh: 骑自行车时戴头盔能保证你的安全。

sentences.en: The instructions are simply to finish your homework.
sentences.zh: 要求很简单，就是完成你的作业。

sentences.en: She dressed simply in a white T-shirt and jeans.
sentences.zh: 她穿着简单，一件白色T恤和牛仔裤。

sentences.en: Don't fear the dark; it's just night time.
sentences.zh: 不要害怕黑暗，那只是夜晚。

sentences.en: Her fear of dogs made her run away.
sentences.zh: 她对狗的害怕让她跑开了。

zh: 不管⋯⋯（还是）；或者⋯⋯（或者）；是否

sentences.en: I don't know whether she will come to the party.
sentences.zh: 我不知道她是否会来参加派对。

sentences.en: He asked whether we had finished our homework.
sentences.zh: 他问我们是否完成了家庭作业。

sentences.en: My new friend is from India, so he is Indian.
sentences.zh: 我的新朋友来自印度，所以他是印度人。

sentences.en: Indian culture has a long history and rich traditions.
sentences.zh: 印度文化有着悠久的历史和丰富的传统。

zh: 日本的；日本人的；日语的

sentences.en: My friend is learning Japanese as a second language.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友正在把日语作为第二语言学习。

sentences.en: Japanese is spoken by many people in Japan and some other countries.
sentences.zh: 日语在日本和其他一些国家被很多人使用。

sentences.en: A fox is a clever animal with a bushy tail.
sentences.zh: 狐狸是一种有毛茸茸尾巴的聪明动物。

sentences.en: We saw a red fox running through the forest yesterday.
sentences.zh: 昨天我们看见一只红狐穿过森林。

sentences.en: This small town has mild weather all year round.
sentences.zh: 这个小镇全年气候温和。

sentences.en: You can see green trees in the park all year round.
sentences.zh: 公园里全年都能看到绿树。

sentences.en: The equator is an imaginary line around the middle of the Earth.
sentences.zh: 赤道是一条环绕地球中部的假想线。

sentences.en: Countries near the equator usually have warm weather all year round.
sentences.zh: 赤道附近的国家通常全年气候温暖。

zh: 在任何⋯⋯的时候；无论何时

sentences.en: You can call me whenever you need help.
sentences.zh: 无论何时需要帮助，你都可以打电话给我。

sentences.en: Whenever it rains, my cat likes to sleep by the window.
sentences.zh: 无论何时下雨，我的猫都喜欢在窗边睡觉。

sentences.en: Spring is my favorite season because flowers bloom everywhere.
sentences.zh: 春天是我最喜欢的季节，因为到处都开满了花。

sentences.en: We often fly kites in the park during spring.
sentences.zh: 春天我们经常在公园里放风筝。

sentences.en: Mostly, students go to school by bike in my town.
sentences.zh: 在我的小镇，学生们大多骑自行车上学。

sentences.en: She mostly eats vegetables for dinner.
sentences.zh: 她晚餐主要吃蔬菜。

sentences.en: What is your favorite location to visit during holidays?
sentences.zh: 你假期最喜欢去的地方是哪里？

sentences.en: The map shows the location of the new school.
sentences.zh: 这张地图标出了新学校的位置。

sentences.en: We often play basketball in the yard after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我们经常在院子里打篮球。

sentences.en: My grandmother grows many flowers in her small yard.
sentences.zh: 我的奶奶在她的小院子里种了很多花。

sentences.en: We are having a yard sale to sell our old books and toys.
sentences.zh: 我们要举办一场庭院旧货出售来卖掉我们的旧书和玩具。

sentences.en: My neighbor found a nice chair at the yard sale down the street.
sentences.zh: 我邻居在街边的庭院旧货出售中找到了一把漂亮的椅子。

sentences.en: The little girl has a sweet smile.
sentences.zh: 这个小女孩有一个甜甜的微笑。

sentences.en: Honey tastes sweet and many people like it.
sentences.zh: 蜂蜜尝起来很甜，很多人都喜欢。

sentences.en: I have a good memory for people's names.
sentences.zh: 我对人名的记忆力很好。

sentences.en: We need to memory these new words before the test.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在考试前记住这些新单词。

sentences.en: A dollar is equal to one hundred cents.
sentences.zh: 一美元等于一百美分。

sentences.en: I need ten more cents to buy this candy.
sentences.zh: 我还需要十美分才能买这块糖果。

sentences.en: My little brother likes to play with his toy car in the yard.
sentences.zh: 我的弟弟喜欢在院子里玩他的玩具汽车。

sentences.en: She received a soft toy bear as a birthday present from her friend.
sentences.zh: 她收到了朋友送的一只柔软的玩具熊作为生日礼物。

sentences.en: The little bear is playing in the forest.
sentences.zh: 这只小熊正在森林里玩耍。

sentences.en: I can see a bear sleeping under the tree.
sentences.zh: 我能看见一只熊在树下睡觉。

sentences.en: The little boy wants to be a toy maker when he grows up.
sentences.zh: 这个小男孩长大后想成为一名玩具制造者。

sentences.en: Her mother is a skilled dress maker in the town.
sentences.zh: 她的妈妈是镇上一位熟练的裁缝。

sentences.en: My mother uses a bread maker to make fresh bread every weekend.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈每个周末都用面包机做新鲜面包。

sentences.en: Can you show me how to operate this new bread maker?
sentences.zh: 你能教我怎么操作这台新面包机吗？

sentences.en: She wears a red scarf to keep her neck warm in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天她戴一条红色围巾来保暖脖子。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new scarf as a birthday present.
sentences.zh: 妈妈给我买了一条新围巾作为生日礼物。

sentences.en: The soft pillow feels comfortable to sleep on.
